DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate effectiveness safety everolimus-eluting stent ( XIENCE , Abbott ) `` real world '' daily practice compare first-generation drug-eluting stent ( sirolimus-eluting stent ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Everolimus-Eluting Stents ( The K-XIENCE Registry )
DOC.detailed_description: This study non-randomized , open-label registry compare efficacy safety everolimus-eluting stent versus sirolimus-eluting stent patient coronary artery disease .
DOC.criteria: Patients receive XIENCE stent The patient guardian agree study protocol schedule clinical followup , provide informed , write consent , approve appropriate Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committee respective clinical site . Patients mixture DESs Terminal illness life expectancy < 1 year . Patients cardiogenic shock
